item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, there. I am Zhitao Lin, an undergraduate of Software Engineering. E-mail: lamchito@outlook.com

item.title: The Stupid Way to GRE 330
item.description: Part one – vocabulary part two – verbal part three – quantity part four – writing part five – the end prologue : i spent two and a half months to prepare the gre exam and get a 161 in verbal and 169 in quantity. i literally donâ€™t have talent in language things. but luckily, i am hard working and stick to a stupid but correct path. i absorbed most of the following ideas for the preparation of gre from zhihu.
